title: DistroWatch Weekly, Issue 1057
description: This week in DistroWatch Weekly: Review: Adelie Linux 1.0 BetaNews: Debian works to prepare packages against 2038 bug and updates install media, elementary OS splits application and system updates, Redox makes it easier to port Linux software, Fedora announces Atomic DesktopsQuestions and answers: Rolling release vs fixed for a smoother experienceReleased last weekTorrent corner: KDE neon, SparkyLinuxUpcoming releases: FreeBSD 13.3-BETA3Opinion poll: How established does a distribution need to be before you will try it?Reader comments Read more in this week's issue of DistroWatch Weekly....
